name: Charge! (itch)
description:
Charge!

A Viking Rampage!

Rampage across England with your battle-axe in this retro endlessrunner for pico8.

Z/C to attack

X/V to use your shield. This does not protect you from running into the enemies, only from their projectiles.

If you like this game consider following me here or on twitter (@randomhuman) to learn about my upcoming releases. You can find more ways to keep track of me on my website.
